creator: kmcurry@home.com
text:
If the value of JAXP_HOME is set to "\Program Files\JavaSoft\Jaxp1.0.1" the 
builder will throw a NoClassDefFound Exception.  I presume this is because of 
the space in "Program Files."  I was able to correct the problem by moving 
JAXP_HOME to point to the jars in the ant\lib folder

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
Can you give more information on this? Ant does not use JAXP_HOME, that I am 
aware of. What is the "builder"?
